report.title: Sample attributes wih hiddens
report.description: Report used to retrieve custom attributes of an sample which are not included in a list of attributes to ignore.
report.query:
select DISTINCT ON (av.id) s.id, 'Parent sample' as attribute_type, a.system_function, a.id as attr_id, saw.weight as w1, fsb1.weight as w2, fsb2.weight as w3, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN 'Text' WHEN 'L' THEN 'Lookup List' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Integer' WHEN 'B' THEN 'Boolean' WHEN 'F' THEN 'Float' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Specific Date' WHEN 'V' THEN 'Vague Date' ELSE a.data_type END AS data_type, CASE '#language#' WHEN '' THEN a.caption ELSE COALESCE(TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM (a.caption_i18n->'#language#')::varchar), a.caption) END AS caption, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L' THEN lookup.term::text WHEN 'I' THEN coalesce(l.name, av.int_value::varchar) WHEN 'B' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'F' THEN av.float_value::varchar WHEN 'D' THEN av.date_start_value::varchar WHEN 'V' THEN (av.date_start_value::varchar || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::varchar ELSE NULL::text END || CASE WHEN a.data_type IN ('I', 'F') AND a.allow_ranges=true THEN COALESCE(' - ' || av.upper_value::text, '') ELSE '' END AS value, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'I' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'B' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'F' THEN av.float_value::varchar WHEN 'D' THEN av.date_start_value::varchar WHEN 'V' THEN (av.date_start_value::varchar || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::varchar ELSE NULL::text END AS raw_value, CASE WHEN a.data_type IN ('I', 'F') AND a.allow_ranges=true THEN av.upper_value ELSE null END AS upper_value from samples s join sample_attribute_values av on av.sample_id=s.parent_id and av.deleted=false join sample_attributes a on a.id=av.sample_attribute_id and a.deleted=false left join sample_attributes_websites saw on saw.sample_attribute_id=a.id and saw.deleted=false left join form_structure_blocks fsb1 on fsb1.id=saw.form_structure_block_id left join form_structure_blocks fsb2 on fsb2.id=fsb1.parent_id left join cache_termlists_terms lookup on a.data_type='L' and lookup.id=av.int_value left join locations l on a.system_function='linked_location_id' and l.id=av.int_value and l.deleted=false where s.id=#sample_id# and s.deleted=false and lower(coalesce(#testagainst#,'')) #operator# (#attrs#) union
select DISTINCT ON (av.id) av.sample_id, 'Sample' as attribute_type, a.system_function, a.id as attr_id, saw.weight, fsb1.weight, fsb2.weight, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN 'Text' WHEN 'L' THEN 'Lookup List' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Integer' WHEN 'B' THEN 'Boolean' WHEN 'F' THEN 'Float' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Specific Date' WHEN 'V' THEN 'Vague Date' ELSE a.data_type END AS data_type, CASE '#language#' WHEN '' THEN a.caption ELSE COALESCE(TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM (a.caption_i18n->'#language#')::varchar), a.caption) END AS caption, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L' THEN lookup.term::text WHEN 'I' THEN coalesce(l.name, av.int_value::varchar) WHEN 'B' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'F' THEN av.float_value::varchar WHEN 'D' THEN av.date_start_value::varchar WHEN 'V' THEN (av.date_start_value::varchar || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::varchar ELSE NULL::text END || CASE WHEN a.data_type IN ('I', 'F') AND a.allow_ranges=true THEN COALESCE(' - ' || av.upper_value::text, '') ELSE '' END AS value, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'I' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'B' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'F' THEN av.float_value::varchar WHEN 'D' THEN av.date_start_value::varchar WHEN 'V' THEN (av.date_start_value::varchar || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::varchar ELSE NULL::text END AS raw_value, CASE WHEN a.data_type IN ('I', 'F') AND a.allow_ranges=true THEN av.upper_value ELSE null END AS upper_value from sample_attribute_values av join sample_attributes a on a.id=av.sample_attribute_id and a.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms lookup on a.data_type='L' and lookup.id=av.int_value left join sample_attributes_websites saw on saw.sample_attribute_id=a.id and saw.deleted=false left join form_structure_blocks fsb1 on fsb1.id=saw.form_structure_block_id left join form_structure_blocks fsb2 on fsb2.id=fsb1.parent_id left join locations l on a.system_function='linked_location_id' and l.id=av.int_value and l.deleted=false where av.sample_id=#sample_id# and av.deleted=false and (a.system_function<>'cms_user_id' or a.system_function is null) and lower(coalesce(#testagainst#,'')) #operator# (#attrs#)

param.name: sample_id
param.description: ID of the sample to load

param.name: attrs
param.description: CSV list of attributes to include or exclude. Lowercase.

param.name: testagainst
param.description: Test for fields to include or exclude using the caption or the system function of the custom attribute

param.name: operator
param.description: Do you want to include only the list of attributes you've defined, or exclude them?

param.name: language
param.description: ISO 3 letter code of language to use for captions if available.
